page.title: 06MIDDLETON PUBLIC HOUSES
page.content: Middleton has plenty of pubs to suit everyone.{GARRY Age 18 }"I like modern pubs & go for the video games & company. I don't drink. Pubs are an important part of social life in Middleton because there is nothing else to do. Some pubs are very popular with young people and that's a good idea - you can meet people your own age. Pubs are good meeting places before you go on to somewhere else like a club or a party."{MUMS & DADS like traditional old-style pubs, cosy & friendly, to meet their friends & have a good chat & play darts. Pubs are popular because people say there is nothing else to do in Middleton & they are a good part of social life. Nothing will take the place of a pub. Everyone agrees that the {Old Boar's {Head}should be preserved because it is very historical.
